text: Aur uss ki qom dorti hui uss kay pass aa phonchi woh to pehlay hi say bad kaariyon mein mubtila thi loot (alh-e-salam) ney kaha aey qom kay logo! Yeh hain meri betiyan jo tumharay liye boht hi pakeeza hain Allah say daro aur mujhay meray mehamnon kay baray mein ruswa na kero. Kiya tum mein say aik bhi bhala aadmi nahi
